original_title: We Stand Alone Together: The Men of Easy Company
overview: Over a period of two years, Mark Cowen and his crew travelled to thirty U.S. states and ten European cities, to interview the veterans of Easy Company. The stories told by the veterans themselves, create a history of the Second World War from the point of view of this heroic company of men, made famous in the mini-series Band of Brothers.
title: We Stand Alone Together: The Men of Easy Company
